tool_description: Analyzes vitamin, mineral, and micronutrient content in pet food, evaluating adequacy against species-specific requirements and identifying potential deficiencies or excesses.

product_id.description: Unique identifier of the pet food product

species.description: Target species: dog, cat, rabbit, bird, or ferret

life_stage.description: Life stage: puppy, kitten, adult, senior, or pregnant

vitamin_supplements.description: List of vitamin supplements in ingredients

mineral_supplements.description: List of mineral supplements in ingredients

error_messages: Unsupported species: Use one of [dog, cat, rabbit, bird, ferret]
Invalid life stage: Use one of [puppy, kitten, adult, senior, pregnant]
Invalid mineral percentages: Calcium and phosphorus must be between 0 and 10%
Unrecognized supplements: Some vitamin or mineral supplements not found in database
usage: Provide product_id, species, and life_stage. Include any available calcium/phosphorus percentages and supplement lists. The tool evaluates micronutrient adequacy.

calcium_phosphorus_ratio.description: Calcium to phosphorus ratio if available
